Question 80) With the 1850 land law, access to land was only possible through purchase with cash payment. This limited, or even practically prevented, access to land to slave workers who gained freedom.
 OLIVEIRA, A. U. Brazilian agriculture: recent transformations. In: Ross, J. L. S. Geography of Brazil. Sao Paulo: Edusp, 2009.
The legal fact evidenced in the text accentuated the process of
A) Agrarian Reform.
B) mercantile expansion.
C) land concentration.
D) deruralization of the elite.
E) mechanization of production.
